entry.title: Showtime will offer streaming service on Roku and PlayStation

entry.title: Teenager in Austrian 'Playstation' terrorism case gets two years
Spotify comes to PlayStation
entry.summary: PlayStation users have long been able to watch DVDs and stream Netflix, Amazon and YouTube shows with the console.

entry.title: PlayStation Gets Spotify, Replacing Sony's Own Music Service
entry.summary:
Spotify is coming to the PlayStation, replacing Sony's own Music Unlimited service, as the company continues to expand the game console into an entertainment hub beyond video games.

Spotify hits the PlayStation 3 and 4 on Monday, with a new app adapted for large television screens.

Just two weeks ago, Sony launched an online television service, PlayStation Vue, offering more than 50 over-the-air and cable channels starting at $50 a month.

Its music app is available on some Internet-connected TVs and set-top boxes, but Spotify says it worked closely with Sony to optimize its service for the PlayStation.

Existing Spotify customers will get access to the PlayStation app with their usual sign-in.

entry.title: Sony's PlayStation Music launches with Spotify
entry.summary: You can also use the PlayStation controller.

entry.title: Details on PlayStation Vue, comparison with Sling TV
entry.summary:
NEW YORK (AP) - Sony's new PlayStation Vue online TV service launched in three cities last week with more than 50 channels starting at $50.

You'll be able to use the PlayStation Vue password.

entry.title: Details on PlayStation Vue, comparison with Sling TV
entry.summary:
if each has a separate PlayStation 3 or 4 (only one can be a PS4).

Many shows from the past three days are automatically available for viewing, but only through the PlayStation, not on mobile.

entry.title: Sony launches PlayStation Vue online TV service in 3 U.S. cities
entry.summary:
Initially, PlayStation Vue is available only on PlayStation 4s and PS3s; per Sony, there are 35 million of those in use across the U.S. Sony said support for Apple's iPad will be coming shortly, and that additional markets will be added in the coming months.

For each PlayStation Vue account, users can simultaneously stream content on up to three consoles (although only on one PS4 at any given time) in the same home at no additional charge.
